original_text: It set itself up to be as great as the commander of the army of the Lord; it took away the daily sacrifice from the Lord, and his sanctuary was thrown down.
korean_text: 또 스스로 높아져서 군대의 주재를 대적하며 그에게 매일 드리는 제사를 없애 버렸고 그의 성소를 헐었으며

sentences.original_text: It set itself up to be as great as
the commander of the army of the Lord
it took away the daily sacrifice from the Lord
and his sanctuary was thrown down
